column4: hi, i cannot really test my ssd with smartmontools : Warning: device does not support Self Test Logging. But i had some i/o problems while installing ubuntu on this ssd. So i want to check it. How do i do that ?
at least theres no reallocated sectors
i never heard of this brand before
i do not know if it is a good one
ocz ? sorry english is not my mother tongue
i have 3 ocz drives, but only one is in a system with smartmontools. That drive is a vertex 2, and it displays smartctl -a /dev/sdb  with no errors
make sure AHCI is enabled for the sata controller in the bios, and that trim is enabled in fstab
